title: TFR Ep. 571: Malignant, Kate, 5 Favorite James Wan Scenes
description:
This week on the big show, Chris and Matt discuss James Wan's return to the horror genre, "Malignant." Is this the body horror-Giallo-80's-Euro Horror mash-up that EVERYbody has been clamoring for all these years or is this a case of too many ingredients spoiling the stew? Then our mini-marathon of films with a woman's first name kicks-off with Mary Elizabeth Winsted in "Kate," as MEW Jane Wicks her way across Japan in a Netflix exclusive action flick. As always. Chris runs down the "big" releases on physical media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  We wrap the show with our Top 5 James Wan Scenes because we know you are just dying to know what we think. You can't wait to listen!

00:00-14:20: Intro/Malignant

14:21-26:29: Physical Media Picks

26:30-34:35: Kate

34:36-42:37: 5 Favorite James Wan Scenes

42:38-44:48: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook
